message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split, considering I'm taking the hit from inflation.
The inflation is hitting you harder each round, Bob. Let's settle this now with 58/42.
I'd rather take a bigger share now, even with inflation, than settle for less. 57/43 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Accept this 59/41 split before inflation eats away at your share even more!
